 If theft was legal, do you think theft incidences would be unaffected? Imagine that theft was legal - would you agree that criminalising theft would reduce it?
 Similarly, controlling widespread gun ownership will reduce widespread gun ownership, which will cause (after a brief period of adjustment, which is why such control must be introduce gradually) a reduction in gun crime.
